Determine Vega JavaScript versions

Source: R/vega-version.R
vega_version.Rd

Determine Vega JavaScript versions

vega_version(major = FALSE)

Arguments

major

logical return major version-tags rather than the tags for the specific versions supported by this package

Value

list with character elements named vega_lite, vega, vega_embed

Examples

  vega_version()

#> $vega_lite
#> [1] "4.17.0"
#> 
#> $vega
#> [1] "5.17.0"
#> 
#> $vega_embed
#> [1] "6.12.2"
#> 
  vega_version(major = TRUE)

#> $vega_lite
#> [1] "4"
#> 
#> $vega
#> [1] "5"
#> 
#> $vega_embed
#> [1] "6"
#>
